title: Chargers outlast the Steelers, Chiefs down the Cowboys, Bad home losses for Titans and Bills, Nate Burleson, and Monday Night Football preview!
itunes:title: Chargers outlast the Steelers, Chiefs down the Cowboys, Bad home losses for Titans and Bills, Nate Burleson, and Monday Night Football preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara break down the Chargers outlasting the Steelers on Sunday Night Football. The crew wonders if there's a way to get past the 'Chargering' reputation this team has. The Chiefs put up an impressive defensive performance against the Cowboys, while the Titans and Bills suffer bad losses at home. Nate Burleson drops by with his Espresso moment and joins the crew with Game Balls. Plus, we get a preview of the Monday Night Football matchup between the Giants and Buccaneers

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
